org.mt4j.util.opengl
Class JoglGL20Plus

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.util.opengl.JoglGL20Plus
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL10, org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL11, org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL11Plus, org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL20, org.mt4j.util.opengl.GLCommon
public final class JoglGL20Plus
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL20, org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL11, org.mt4j.util.opengl.GL11Plus

An implementation of the GL20 and GL11 interface based on Jogl. Note that Jogl shaders and OpenGL ES shaders will not be 100% compatible. Some glGetXXX methods are not implemented.

Author:
mzechner
